153.content:
Since the early 1960's release of Spacewars!, the video game industry has grown into the one of the world's central form entertainment behind broadcast and cable TV. In the 1980's, the video game industry boomed with the release of arcade video games such as PAC-MAN, Donkey Kong, Super Mario Bros., and Street Fighter, to name a few.

In the 1990's, the industry expanded further not only with the release of video game consoles (such as the Nintendo hardware systems and the Sony PlayStation consoles), but with the release of video games with early 3-D graphics. Star Fox and Donkey Kong Country were among the earliest examples. The early 2000's saw the rise of revolutionary gameplay, such as double-screen handheld consoles, motion controls, mobile gaming, and a console switching from docking at the television to a handheld console.

During the expansion of the video game industry, many influential video game companies have made their mark in the industry, more prominently Nintendo, SEGA, Capcom, and Square Enix, each of them being well-known for their influential game franchises.

Nintendo has many iconic games featuring young male characters, but for the sake of the Video Games route, Nintendo will feature its own route. That being said, some of the more iconic games from different major game companies like SEGA, Capcom, and Square Enid appears on this route.

Which of these prominent video games will you explore?

Nintendo (featuring Super Mario, The Legend of Zelda, and Pokémon)

Sonic the Hedgehog series

Street Fighter series

-or-

Final Fantasy series
153.title: Video Games

1531.content:
Nintendo has been the hallmark video game company since the early 1980's. Arcade games such as Super Mario Bros., Donkey Kong, and The Legend of Zelda have grown into some of the best-selling video game franchises in the series, each one known for their revolutionary gameplay mechanics, their storytelling, and most importantly, their iconic characters, including Nintendo's mascot and most iconic video game character, Mario.

In this route, we will be focusing on certain boy characters appearing in Nintendo's famous franchises, either as a canon character such as Young Link (from The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time and Majora's Mask), or an original character of your choice within the canon or non-canon Nintendo game universes. They will be shrunken, born tiny, or every woman in the Nintendo games is bigger than the normal-sized character. The only question is, which of these famous Nintendo franchises will you choose?

Super Mario Bros. series

The Legend of Zelda series

Pokémon series

-or-

Super Smash Bros. series
1531.title: Nintendo

154.content:
Since the days when stories written in papers and ink quills, there have been many stories and fairy tales about heroic young male characters born the size of a thumb, mythical realms inhabited by giants and/or tiny people, and sometimes even a bit of both.

Fairy tales such as Jack and the Beanstalk features the young main character Jack climbing up the beanstalk into a cloudy land inhabited by giants. A common trope among Tom Thumb-styled fairy tales, such as the eponymous story and the Japanese legend of Issun-boshi, features a consistent story of a poor peasant couple wishing for a child, and is granted with a boy born the size of a thumb. It also features the tiny boys getting eaten by gigantic beasts and giants.

Literature novels such as Gulliver's Travels features two separate islands each inhabited by the diminutive Lilliputians and the giant Brobdingnagians. May Norton's The Borrowers series, and John Peterson's The Littles series both feature miniature people living in the walls of an inhabited home who borrow and/or steal from the occupants.

For the sake of argument and variety within the Literature Books route, which of these stories will you choose?

Jack and the Beanstalk

Tom Thumb-styled stories

Gulliver's Travels

-or-

The Borrowers/The Littles
154.title: Literature Books

155.content:
Since the early 1920's, comic strips were printed in the newspapers for entertainment. As the years rolled by, the comic strips eventually earned their own comic book magazine, and the earliest big comic book company to emerge was DC Comics. In the early 1960's, the first Fantastic Four comic issue marked the debut of Marvel Comics. These two major comic book companies have become two of the biggest names in the comic book history, creating iconic heroes, villains, and influential storylines.

Other major comic book companies, while overshadowed by the competitiveness of DC and Marvel, have published their own iconic comic books as well, such as Archie from Archie Comics, and Spawn and Invincible from Image Comics to name a few.

For the sake of argument and variety within the Comic Books route, which of these comic book companies will you choose?

DC Comics (featuring Superman, Batman, Wonder Woman, and the Justice League)

Marvel (featuring Spider-Man, The Avengers, The Fantastic Four, and the X-Men)

Image Comics (featuring Spawn, Youngblood, etc.)

-or-

Archie Comics (featuring Archie, Sabrina the Teenage Witch, Josie and the Pussycats)
155.title: Comic Books or Graphic Novels

1551.content:
DC Comics is one of the oldest comic book companies in the world, notable for its fictional locations such as Metropolis and Gotham City, its heroes such as Superman, Batman, and Wonder Woman, and villains such as the Joker, Lex Luthor, and the Cheetah.

In this route, we will be focusing on certain boy characters appearing in the DC Universe, either as a canon character such as Damian Wayne (a.k.a. Robin), or an original character of your choice within the canon DC Universe. They will be shrunken, born tiny, or every woman in the DC Comics is bigger than the normal-sized character. The only question is, is the focus character from the DC Comics or an original character?
1551.title: DC Comics

15511.content:
The focus boy character is a character canon to the DC Universe.

Choose one of the following characters you want to focus on...

Damian Wayne/Robin IV: The biological son of Bruce Wayne/Batman, and Talia al Ghul, daughter to the leader of the League of Assassins, Ra’s al Ghul. A result of impregnation, Damian is trained from birth by the elite group of assassins and has inherited much of his father's broodiness. He has taken up the mantle as the fourth Robin, but unlike his previous three successors, Damian hardly has any sense of humor.

Jonathan Kent/Superboy: The biological son of Clark Kent/Superman and Lois Lane, the Pulitzer Prize-winning reporter of the Daily Planet. Jonathan is born half-Kryptonian, meaning he inherited his father’s abilities which is awakened under the yellow sun. He and Damian often go on strange and fantastic adventures, often serving as Damian's foil to his broodiness.

Billy Batson/Captain Marvel: The son of two archaeologists who were killed during their final expedition by their partner, Teth-Adam, who would later become the Khandaq dictator Black Adam. Taking the subway to the Rock of Eternity, Billy Batson was chosen as a champion of the residing wizard and is bestowed the ability to transform into the mighty Captain Marvel by shouting “SHAZAM!” He lives in a foster home with foster siblings his age, including his twin sister, Mary, who all gain Billy's abilities by shouting "SHAZAM!"

-or-

Garfield Logan/Beast Boy: The son of two jungle explorers who, during an expedition, he was bitten by an infected green monkey, which gave him the ability to transform into the animal kingdom, but also turned his ears and hair green. After his parents died in a boating accident, Beast Boy was taken in by the Doom Patrol and found a family in his team, later joining the Teen Titans as its youngest member.
15511.title: Canon

choices: The Shrunken Son of Man's World
15512.content:
The focus main boy character is an original character and non-canon to the main DC Comics storyline.

Choose one of these story routes you want to focus on...

The Shrunken Son of Man's World: The boy is on a passenger flight overseas with his family as it flew over the Bermuda Triangle, which was experiencing a strange lightning storm. The storm also sent out strange electromagnetic pulses, which activated the boy's meta-gene, shrinking him down to the size of one-inch right before the lightning struck the plane. The lightning also struck the window of his seat, sucking the boy out into the sea as the plane crashed down into the sea. He eventually drifts to the shores of Themyscira, home to the Amazons and Wonder Woman!

The Son of a Super-Villainess: The boy is not biologically related to the villainesses appearing in this route, but born to a couple of scientists working in STAR Labs. Born tiny because of his parents' continued exposure to the radiation of STAR Labs technology and the fumes of the experimental chemicals, the boy made the national headlines for his abnormal size. The STAR Labs scientists hired a nanny to watch over the boy, not knowing that the nanny in question was an infamous villainess who kidnapped him in his sleep and raised him. The boy's future as hero or villain in ambiguous.

The Katarthan Kid: The boy is a member of the Katarthans, a six-inch race of alien humanoids who crash-landed in the Amazon Rainforest seen in the six-issue miniseries, Sword of the Atom. When the Katarthans were eradicated by a fireball during a fight between Ray Palmer/The Atom II and seven Brazilian drug runners, the Katarthan boy was the only survivor. He wandered the Amazon rainforest for many weeks until he came across a giant woman, either a native Brazilian or a foreign visitor.

-or-

The Black Fly: The boy is a troubled delinquent who took to snatching in the streets of Washington D.C. and evaded police. In order to make a better living, the boy joins the museum tour of the Justice League's Hall of Justice and decides to steal and sell off the collected trophies of the League's various adventures, including Atomica's malfunctioning shrinking belt. That night, the boy sneaks into the Hall of Justice and snatches a few of the trophies, but he is discovered by the female members of the League, so he uses the shrinking belt to escape, only to be permanently shrunk. He is either caught and at the mercy of the Justice League giantesses, or he escapes but is sought by the giant villainesses.
15512.title: Non-Canon

155121.content:
The Shrunken Son of Man's World

Character Bios

Name: Timmy Walker
Age: 8 years old
Eyes: Blue
Hair: Black
Height: 3' 9"
Weight: 103 lbs.
Ethnicity: White/Caucasian
Backstory: Timmy Walker is born to his mother, Michelle Walker, a father, and two older brothers. During spring break, the Walker family decided they were going to fly from their hometown in Florida to Italy for the week. Unfortunately, their flight path takes them through the Bermuda Triangle, an area infamous for the disappearances of different airplanes and ships, and is protected by a mystical lightning storm. This lightning storm will not only change Timmy's fate, but also his small size as well.

Main Story:
The Walker family was ready to board the flight to their overseas destination to Italy. Michelle Walker, the matriarch of the Walker family, was taking her husband and her three sons to Italy for their spring break. Michelle and her husband was excited to explore the beautiful Italian countryside to see the beautiful sights and tourist attractions. The older two brothers were excited to explore the pretty girls of Italy and vainly attempt to swoon them with their fake Italian accents. Eight year-old Timmy, the youngest member of the family, was excited to try out the food.

Timmy was the youngest and the most energetic member of his family, having a strong penchant for food at his age. Where Where China had been the country to invent noodles, Italy was the place where they perfected it into all kinds of pastas, pizzas, and soups, and Timmy couldn't wait to try them all out. Their flight path went from Florida to an international airport in Italy, directly over the Atlantic Ocean.

What they would find over a certain area was certain doom, because the flight paths went over the Bermuda Tringle, an area off the coast of Florida where strong electromagnetic fields conjured up strong lightning storms and made any magnetic instrument go haywire. The worst part were the mysterious disappearances of different ships and aircrafts reported over the years. Then again, in recent years, those reports of disappearing transports diminished, and the dangers of the Bermuda Triangle were mostly forgotten and scrubbed away. No one could ever predict what would happen to Flight 407 to Italy.

It happened two hours after the airplane took off the runway. The flight was relatively peaceful, people conversing with each other, kids squirming in their seats or preoccupied with their handheld game consoles. In Timmy's case, he was the only kid on the plane playing his Nintendo 3DS, sitting in the window seat while his mother and father took the middle and aisle seats respectively. He was totally engrossed in his game, and the only things that would normally snap him out of his reverie were refreshments, a bathroom break, a movie, and when his DS's battery ran out.

Midway through this ill-fated flight, a strong pounding sensation, a consistent shuddering, and flickering lights snapped Timmy out of it, scaring him and all the other passengers onboard. Timmy turned to the window and saw nothing but dark clouds and the strobing flashes of lightning. Suddenly, he felt his body tingle all over, like every muscle in his body fell asleep and was accompanied with the prickly nerve sensation. He whimpered as he quickly diminished in his seat, he and his clothes shrinking in his seat, loosening the seatbelt. Michelle gasped at the sight of her son shrinking before her eyes... and Timmy could only look up to his now-giant mother for salvation.

"Mommy?"

All of a sudden, a bolt of lightning struck his window, shattering it and causing the air pressure to get sucked out and everything else small enough to fit along with it. Timmy screamed as he tried to hold on to his seatbelt. Before Michelle could reach him, Timmy's grip on the leather slipped and he was sucked into the open air, falling miles above the Atlantic just as another lightning bolt struck the plane's engines. The plane went down with one of the engines blazing like an apocalyptic fireball, crashing into the ocean the same time Timmy merely plunked into the water.

The boy quickly surfaced into the turbulent ocean waters and watched helplessly as the plane sunk into the ocean, taking everyone inside with it. Timmy cried for his mommy just as a wave dragged him under the surface, pulling him down with the pressure. Between his tiny size and the ocean's heavy pressure, all Timmy could do was try to swim back up to the surface, but he was too weak against everything else. His struggles led to physical soreness, then to mental fatigue, and then finally, loss of consciousness. Before he blacked out, he vaguely saw giant feminine shapes in the water swimming towards him.

Do not fear child. It is not your time, yet, a soothing motherly voice gently spoke to him.

The next thing Timmy knew, he was hacking up saltwater from his lungs. After he hacked up the last of the seawater, Timmy looked around and saw only a beach, but appearing more gigantic to his shrunken size. He stood up in the sand, feeling the sand's grit stronger grit against his feet, and looked out into the ocean. He stared out into the vast ocean waters underneath the bright, blue, and partly cloudy skies and fell into a fetal position. Then everything came crashing down on him as he began to cry, wailing for the death of his family, for the death of his mommy, and for the traumatic event he was forced to endure. He was alone and stranded on this island, and he could never get his family back.

Then came the noise of someone striding the sands, accompanied by the slight tremors with each stride. Timmy broke away from his mourning and turned to the direction of the sound. The person (or people) approaching his area was a giant woman by his size! This giantess was none other than...
155121.title: The Shrunken Son of Man's World

1551211.content:
The giantess is Princess Diana of Themyscira (a.k.a. Wonder Woman).

This route is divided between Princess Diana before and after she takes the mantle of Themyscira's Champion.

The only question is, which route will you choose:

Before Wonder Woman: Princess Diana of Themyscira often wanders the shores of Themyscira, wishing and praying to the Greek gods of legend that there would be more to the world outside the mystic barriers surrounding Paradise Island than within. One day, she spots a giant metal bird crashing into the oceans far off the shores with a wing going down in flames like Icarus. It is only at the shores that she spots the shrunken Son of Man's World, but his gender is forbidden from entering the shores, so she either hides him or brings this matter to her mother, Queen Hippolyta.

After Wonder Woman: Princess Diana of Themyscira recently received word of Flight 407 to Italy passing over the Bermuda Triangle, prompting her to leave her home in Boston and investigate the plane crash not far from the shores of her home island. She finds no survivors in the seawater, as the guarding megalodons already feasted on them, save for one shrunken Son of Man's World washed up on the shores of Themyscira. Wonder Woman will take the tiny boy as her own, either allowing herself or one of her female allies to watch over him.
1551211.title: Diana/Wonder Woman

15512111.content:
(For reference: https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/...)

Princess Diana of Themyscira was special, not because she was a god-gifted homunculus of clay with a soul, or because she was the daughter of Queen Hippolyta, but because she was destined for more. On Paradise Island, there was hardly any corruption or war, but Diana felt there was something for her outside the forbidden mystic barriers surrounding the island with never ending storm clouds. She could feel it stirring deep within her very essence.

That feeling came to light when she spotted what looked like a giant metal bird crashing into the oceans far off the shores of Themyscira. It fell like any bird would fall when pierced with an arrow mid-air, except one of its wings was burning alight Icarus's wings before the blazing sun. It fell into Poseidon's wrathful waters with a mighty splash. Her mother, Queen Hippolyta, would often tell Diana of tales when she returned to Man's World to aid in a bloody worldwide war, and one of those tales was of giant metal birds transporting anyone within its belly into the air and across the waters of the world. Diana couldn't help but bow her head and say a little prayer to the gods to deliver their souls into peace while their bodies were fed to the guarding megalodons.

As Diana witnessed the bird being slowly claimed by the sea, her peripheral vision caught something unusual crawling from the crashing waters on the shores. Gifted with the eyes of Artemis, Goddess of the Hunt and the Moon, Diana squinted her eyes and got a better look. On the shores was the tiny shape of a person laying in the sands in the position of a baby's fetus. The person was small... perhaps it was a child? From what she could see based on the child's shuddering, he was crying. Perhaps the small child was the only survivor of the metal bird’s demise, and traversed through Poseidon’s waters only to wash up on the shores of Themyscira.

“Great Hera. He's all alone,” Diana whispered as she quickly strode over to him.

While Timmy had wept, he picked up the hearing of someone striding the sands, accompanied by the slight tremors with each stride. Timmy broke away from his mourning and turned to the direction of the sound. The person approaching his area was a giant woman by his size! This giantess was a beautiful woman with creamy skin, and hair as black as night pulled into a single braided ponytail. She wore a leather breastplate and metal bracelets on her wrists reaching just below her forearms. Around her waist, she wore a belt with a scabbard sheathed with a sword, holding up a short beige skirt, and knee-high leather gladiator sandals worn on her immaculate feet.

Timmy watched the giantess approach his location. He saw her eyes meeting his tiny stature, he saw how she towered over him, and he began to panic. He quickly got up on his feet and ran as fast as his aching muscles could take him, screaming all the way. “He’s afraid of me,” Diana deduced as she began to pursue him, her strides quickly making up ground. “Little one, wait! Do not be afraid! I have not come to harm you!”

But the tiny panicking boy wouldn’t listen. Driven by his flight response, Timmy ran as fast as his tiny legs would let him. The booming vibrations of the giantess’s feet behind him began to grow bigger and more powerful as she quickly caught up with him. Then all of a sudden, a sandaled foot crashed at his heel, creating a shocking tremor that knocked him off his feet and land face-first into the sand. Before he could quickly recover, a pair of giant ivory hands gently scooped him up along with a handful of sand beneath him and lifted him up to her face.

The tiny boy whimpered and scrambled as the sand beneath him drained from the cracks between the cracks of the giantess’s palms and fingers. Past the waist, the belly, and the breasts, Timmy was lifted to the giantess’s beautiful face. Her blue eyes stared down on him like a goddess, judging his every action leading up to now. Timmy felt the fear overwhelm him and he began to cry.

“Please, don’t hurt me! I don’t wanna die!” Timmy begged, which made the giantess pout pitifully.

“Don’t cry, little one, I’m not going to hurt you,” Diana assured as she gently brought her other hand to comfort the boy. Timmy whimpered and curled in her palm, preparing for the inevitable moment when she might crush him. Instead, he felt the giantess’s fingers gently stroke him on the back, the same way his mother used to when he needed her comfort.

"It is okay, little one. There is no need to cry, I would never harm a child,” Diana cooed, gently stroking the tiny child’s back. She could feel him shivering like he was cold from the water, except he was shuddering out of fear. “My name is Diana. I am the princess of the Amazons of Themyscira, to which you have washed upon its shores. What is your name?”

The tiny boy sniffed and choked, wiping his wet nose with his arm. “M-M-My name is T-T-Timmy, M-Miss Giant. Timmy W-Walker.”

“It is a pleasure to meet you, Timmy. And please, call me Diana,” the giantess said softly and gently the same way her mother used to talk to her when she was his age. “Timmy, I know this may be painful for you to talk about, but were you one of the people who survived the demise of that giant metal bird?”

"Giant... metal bird...?" Timmy turned to the oceans, and he knew what the giantess, Diana referred to. "Yes. My family and I were... were flying all the way from Florida to Italy for a family vacation. W-We were flying, and then we flew into the storm, and then... and..."

The memories of that traumatic even came flooding back in flashes, the mental images of his miniaturization and what happened afterwards making him cry harder. “Th-th-the plane started rumbling, and I somehow got smaller and smaller! Then the light hit my window and I got sucked out of the plane! Then when I was fuh-fuh-falling, th-the plane was hit by the lightning again, and it went down into the ocean! I tried to swim, but I was pulled down underwater and... and...!"

Timmy remembered what he saw next, the images of the plane crashing into the ocean with a flaming wing as clear as crystal, taking his family with him into the depths of Davy Jones' Locker. The shrunken boy screamed and wailed at the fates of his family, and fell into the soft comfort of Diana's palm. "Oh, Timmy, I am so sorry for your loss and for your predicament,” Diana consoled the boy, "but do not worry, young one, because you are not alone now."

“But I am alone!” Timmy wailed. “I lost my mommy! I lost my brothers! I don’t have a family anymore! I’ll never get to see them again!”

Diana gently shushed the boy as she clenched her fist gently and held him close to her chest. With her thumb, she gently ruffled his hair, massaging his scalp as he released his inner turmoil into her bosom. Such a cruel fate for a child, Diana figures, to be shrunken down by the same mystical barrier used to protect this island and to lose his family all at once. This boy was small enough to be stepped on or eaten like a little morsel. He needed guidance, and he needed a mother. Unfortunately, Aphrodite's Law dictated that no man should set foot on this island, and this son of Man's World was no exception.

Then she thought of something on the spot, but it was going to be risky.

1.) Diana takes him back to her secret hiding area in the grotto.
2.) Diana takes him to her mother, Queen Hippolyta, for guidance.
15512111.title: Before Wonder Woman

choices: An Afternoon Nap with the Queen
1551212.content:
(For reference: https://moviecomicswhoswho.files.wordpre...)

Hippolyta, Queen of the Amazons, has governed over her sisters since the times of the Ancient Greek legends of Heracles. For many millennia, Hippolyta has watched over Paradise Island, risen from the bottom of the Pacific Ocean by the Greek gods and protected with a powerful ward from any outside forces. She was the one who crafted her daughter, Diana, from a clay baby and brought to life by the blessings of the gods. She was the one who taught her most of life's most valuable lessons, but was reluctant to teach her the arts of fighting and war.

This was until the male soldier, Steven Rockwell Trevor, crashed his aircraft on the shores of Themyscira, and then everything changed. The man was to be escorted back into Man's World, and only the winner of the fated tournament she arranged would be the one to do it. Against her mother's wishes, Diana won the tournament and was tasked with the burden to take Steve back into Man's World where they revered her as the iconic heroine she is today. This memory was sparked as Hippolyta witnessed the fiery crash of Flight 407 within the perimeter of the powerful storm wards. Dressed in her finest fuchsia robes, Hippolyta quickly raced to the shores and watched the carrier plane sink into Poseidon's cruel waters, and dipped her head in prayer.

"O Hades, god of the underworld, please allow Charon to ferry the poor souls aboard that flying vessel across the River Styx, and let them be at peace within the heavenly fields of Elysium," Hippolyta whispered, a tear shed for each man, woman, and even child aboard the crashed flight. It didn't take much to know that no one could have survived that crash, nor could they avoid the jaws of the megalodons guarding the waters.

And as Hippolyta spent a moment of silence for those who suffered an unfortunate fate, she heard a sniffle... a whimper of a youth. It was very faint, almost like the squeaking of a mouse. She followed her ears to that sound and beheld a saddened sight. It appeared to a child, curled up into a fetal position, grieving for whoever he lost in that vessel. The voice alone confirmed that the child was the son of Man's World. Curiously and surprisingly, the boy was as small as a little seashell! Hippolyta knew the fear of his shrunken size also factored in his weeping. She needed to do something, and she needed to be quick about it, for not only were the beasts of the island would be large enough to gobble him up and the Amazons to accidentally crush him where they stepped, but he was violating Aprohidte's Law upon her people!

Setting her staff down, Hippolyta quickly strode towards the shrunken boy.

While Timmy had wept, he picked up the hearing of someone striding the sands, accompanied by the slight tremors with each stride. Timmy broke away from his mourning and turned to the direction of the sound. The person approaching his area was a giant woman by his size! This giantess was a beautiful woman with creamy skin, and hair as black as night curled like campfire smoke, some of the longer strands curled up in a ponytail. She wore fuchsia robes which bore the size and flow of a theater curtain, and was adorned in a gold belt, and old accessories on her ears and around her neck. Gladiator sandal-clad feet poked from underneath the robes, headed right for him!

Timmy's panic and flight instincts took over as he screamed and ran away from the approaching giantess. "Wait! Little one, wait!" the giantess implored the young shrinkee. "Do not be afraid, little one! I am not trying to harm you!"

But the tiny panicking boy wouldn’t listen. Driven by his flight response, Timmy ran as fast as his tiny legs would let him. The booming vibrations of the giantess’s feet behind him began to grow bigger and more powerful as she quickly caught up with him. Then all of a sudden, a shadow loomed over him as the giantess's left sandaled foot stepped over his tiny frame, landing a ways ahead of him with a boom, enveloping him in fuchsia shadow. On his right, the giantess's right foot stopped shortly ahead of him. Timmy screamed as he was trapped in the shadow underneath the giantess, unable to see, unable to find his way out.

Two additional quakes rocked him from within the darkness. Then a doorway in the darkness lifted into light, and a giant feminine hand adorned in a metallic bracelet reached in, quickly curling a set of five fingers around his tiny frame. Timmy's panic upgraded into hysterics as the giantess held him in her fist and brought him out into the light, lifting him up to her worried face. Hippolyta frowned at the sight of the panicking tiny boy in her palm, stricken by Phobos and overwhelmed with grief.

"Please, Miss Giant, don't hurt me!" Timmy begged, curling up his body and turning to the side.

"Please, child, be at peace. I do not have the desire to harm the son of Man's World, even if he is quite small," Hippolyta gently assured the boy. She gently pet her fingers against Timmy's body, who flinched at the touch at first, but settled under it. "You were aboard the vessel, were you not, child? You were somehow shrunken in the process and ended up on the shores of Themyscira. The fates have not been so kind to you, child."

Timmy sniffled into his sleeve, and sat up in the middle of Hippolyta's giant palm. He built enough courage to stare into the giant queen's eyes, who looked down on him with pity and sympathy. "It is alright, child. I promise no harm will come to you on Themyscira," Hippolyta gently assured, using the same assuring voice she used when Diana was the boy's age. "I am Hippolyta, queen of the Amazons and of this island you were washed upon. Can you tell me where you are from and how you came to be this way?”

Timmy nodded, whimpering. “T-Timmy, your majesty. T-Timmy Walker,” the bite-sized boy answered. "I-I was flying with my family over the ocean to Italy when... when... when a scary storm hit the plane! I don’t know what happened, but I shrunk to this size and I was sucked out of the plane! I fell into the water and I tried to swim but I was so tired, I couldn’t swim anymore! Then I woke up on the beach all alone and... and...”

Timmy couldn’t hold back the urge to cry as he buried his face in his hands. “They’re gone! They’re gone and I can never see them again! I’ll never see my big brothers again! I’ll never see my daddy again! I’ll never see my mommy again!”

While Timmy wept in the queen’s hand, keeling over letting tears flow from his eyes, Hippolyta couldn’t help but feel heartbroken for the poor boy. With her other hand, she gently stroked Timmy’s back, cradling him in her gentle grasp. “I am sorry, little one. This is a fate you did not deserve to suffer from. I can never imagine the pain of your loss and the terror of being so small compared to the rest of the world.”

Timmy sniffled and choked. “I miss them so much!”

"I know, young one. Your grief speaks of it in volumes," Hippolyta answered. She could only watch as the boy poured out his devastations in the palm of her hand, feeling as if he needed someone else in his life, someone who needed a mother more than anything else in the world. "Timmy, I know this may sound so sudden now, but your presence here on this island goes against our rules stating that no men is to enter these shores. Even though you are a child, Timmy, you are still a man."

Timmy continued to weep, his head drooped down in sorrow. A giant gentle index finger lifted his chin and met with Hippolyta's gentle eyes. "But there is still a way for me to bypass this law," the gentle giantess said softly. "If any man is willing to remain on this island, then the man must be bound to an Amazon in servitude. The man will serve the Amazon well, but in accordance to Aphrodite's Law, we must also provide them food, shelter, and comfort in the name of love."

"What... what does that mean?" Timmy asked.

"It means, child, that since you have no family to turn to on Themyscira, you will be living here with me," Hippolyta clarified. "You will have to do what I ask of you in exchange for food and a place to live, but I am sure they will be simple for you, given your current size. I cannot in good conscience ask of you got me to replace the mother you lost, but all I ask is you let me take care of you, nurture you, and encourage your journey to growing into a man. Do you accept this?"

Timmy sniffled, wiping his wet nose again, and nodding his head. "Mm-hmm."

"Good Now hold out your fists to me." Timmy held out his fists, just as the queen ordered him to. "Turn them over."

Timmy overturned his arms, showing the underside of his fists. Hippolyta gently laid her gigantic hand over Timmy's arms, and suddenly, her bracelet glowed as a little drop of light trickled onto his wrists. The light wrapped around the wrists and faded, giving Timmy a pair of metal bracelets just like the giantess said. "Now you are bound to me, young Timmy Walker. As long as you are bound to me, no harm may come of you, nor shall any Amazon attempt to break it. When you are in distress, these bracelets will glow, indicating you are in trouble. In exchange, you will need to do as you are told, but the tasks I will assign you will accommodate your youth and size. Do you understand?"

"Y-Yes, your majesty," Timmy stuttered.

"Very good," Hippolyta nodded. "Come, let us retire. You must be weary from your struggles and you must rest. Allow me to carry you."

So Hippolyta reached dress, and gently inserted Timmy into her cleavage. After securing him in her breasts, the Queen of the Amazons took her staff and marched towards the city.

What happens next?

1.) Timmy and Hippolyta reaches the palace without incident and they retire for the afternoon.
2.) Timmy and Hippolyta reaches the city, but Timmy slips out of her cleavage and lands somewhere in the streets.
1551212.title: Queen Hippolyta

choices: Dinner with the Amazon High Council
A Kid Napping During a Kidnapping!
15512121.content:
Queen Hippolyta marched through the city, her newly-appointed young charge hidden between her breasts. Timmy's face burned bright red as his new giant caretaker strolled through the ivory streets of the Themysciran city, embarrassed by the fact he was restrained between his adopted mother's breasts which bobbed and bounced with each new taken step.

He was obscured behind the hem of Hippolyta's fuchsia gown, keeping him hidden from the eyes of the Amazon Queen's fellow sisters. Hippolyta knew they'd frown upon the idea of allowing a man to stay on Paradise Island, no matter how young he was, and they would frown deeper upon learning that their queen had bound him to her service. Hippolyta would have to explain it later once she reached the palace, feeling the tiny bulk of his frame held in her cleavage, keeping him tightly close to her chest.

Over the hem of the gown, Timmy peeked and observed the city filled with women, all of them around his late mother's age. They were all dressed in similar robes, gowns, and togas, and every one of them engaged in their mundane routine and minding their business. He was quite surprised to see how the women stopped and revered at the sight of their Queen passing them, exclaiming their courteous greetings to her, and the Queen herself returned those courtesies with a smile and a nod. A few Amazons approached her like a good friend and asked her for her review on botanical arrangements, hunting, fishing, and the arts. Each time, Hippolyta gently replied she would review their questions for another time and excused herself to retire for the afternoon. With every step she took, Hippolyta's breasts bounced, rocking the tiny Timmy between them to Morpheus's slumbering bliss.

Hippolyta reached her castle and ascended her stairs, guarded at the bottom and the top by her finest soldiers. As soon as she strolled inside the entrance, she was greeted by two of her most trusted soldiers and friends: Phillipus, a dark-skinned Amazon and general of the Amazonian army, and Artemis, the fierce red-haired warrior of the Amazons.

"My Queen," the two Amazons bowed to Hippolyta.

"My sisters," Hippolyta addressed them.

"Is there anything to report to the high council regarding the flying vessel beyond our shores?" Phillipus inquired, to which the Queen sadly shook her head.

"Nay, Phillipus, the aircraft has been struck down by the protective wards and has been claimed by the sea," Hippolyta said regretfully. "To my knowledge, no one would have survived this horrific accident... no one, save for this..." Hippolyta reached into her chest, gently pinched the tiny carrier in her cleavage up, and brought a curled fist to her most trusted allies. She uncurled her fingers, and in the center of the palm laid the miniscule figure of Timmy Walker, curled up as he slept some of his physical exhaustion off.

"My Queen, what is this?" Artemis asked, clearly surprised by the revelation along with Phillipus.

"This is the son of Man's World who only survived because of the protective ward's effect on him," Hippolyta explained. "I do not know exactly what has become of his family who was aboard the craft or how he bypassed the megalodons, but young Timmy Walker here has been shrunken to his current size, washed up on the shores of Themyscira alone, and is in dire need of a family."

"My Queen, Aphrodite's Law clearly states that no man is to set foot on the island, even one so young such as him!" the ebony Amazon pointed out. "To allow any man on the island is to defy the will of the gods! He cannot be allowed to longer, you know this!"

"I do, Phillipus, and your concern is duly noted," Hippolyta replied, "however, there is another part of the law to which you have also forgotten. Should any man wish to remain on this island, they would be bound to serve an Amazon. Though he is quite young, the boy has no one else to turn to, and I have already establish his bond of servitude to me."

Phillipus and Artemis looked closer, and they saw the same metal bracelets the Amazons were bound to on his wrists as well. "The boy is now bound to his servitude to me, which means his life belongs to me as well," Hippolyta continued. "He may be a man, but he is still a child, and it is the Amazon's nature to encourage the growth of children and to protect them out of love, much like how we raised Diana into the finest warrior in the world."

“But, my Queen...”

“That is enough, Phillipus,” Hippolyta interjected, raising her hand. “I have made my decision. I will be in my chambers to accommodate the boy to my chambers. The trauma he has endured today has drained him of his energy, so I will allow him to rest until the morning when his service to me officially starts."

The motions and the noise were enough to stir Timmy awake in his spot within the giant queen's palm. He rubbed his eyes, heaved a mighty, and sat up in the middle of the warm, leathery platform. He fluttered his eyes open, and was immediately frightened by the sight of two giant fierce-looking women beyond his caretaker's semi-truck-sized fingers.

"Ahh!" Timmy screamed, curling up instinctively. "Please don't hurt me!"

"Be at peace, child, they will not harm you," Hippolyta gently cooed, daintily rubbing Timmy's shuddering frame with her free fingers. The fearful shaking eventually stopped under the giantess's gentle strokes, and Timmy felt compelled to crawl to the edge of her fingers and get a better look at the women who scared him. "These are my most loyal soldiers and sisters, Phillipus and Artemis. Do not let the way they look at you frighten you, young Timmy; you will come to see they have a tender heart beneath their fierce demeanor."

"That remains to be seen," Artemis grumbled, giving Timmy a slight glare, which made him hide behind the queen's monolithic fingers.

"My Queen, I only hope you know what you are doing with this child," Phillipus asked, fearful of the gods' wrath that would be inflicted upon the island, and concerned for the well-being of her Queen and her decision. "The boy must prove his worth of being under our personal charge. If he cannot prove himself, then by the laws bestowed onto us, we would have to force him off the island by way of the sea."

"I do, Phillipus," Hippolyta confirmed, stroking Timmy's back gently like a baby bird, "but you mustn't fear, because we will show him the ways of the Amazon and encourage him to follow on the righteous path, and I will count on you and Artemis to help discipline him should he falter in his tasks." Hippolyta brought her forehead against Phillipus's forehead and looked into each other's eyes intimately. "Please trust me, Phillipus, when I say there is no worse fate for this orphaned child than to send him back to Man's World alone at his current size."

"I do trust you, my Queen," Phillipus said with a low volume, "but I pray that the boy does not end up like all the other men who have failed in the past."

"Then we will make it an effort to make sure it never happens. You and Artemis are dismissed."

"Yes, my Queen."

With a bow, the two giantesses turned and exited the palace, leaving Hippolyta and Timmy alone as they were headed for the Queen's chambers.

"The lady with the red hair scares me," Timmy said meekly, making a Hippolyta chuckle.

“It is natural that she is intimidating. After all, she’s the fiercest warrior among us now,” she said, gently stroking her new charge’s back as she entered the chambers and placed him on the nightstand. "Now, Timmy, I want you to understand that what you heard between me and Phillipus is the truth. I cannot guarantee all of the tasks will be easy given your youth, stature, and inexperience, but every task is to help the betterment of your maturity. If you want to stay among the Amazons, you must complete these tasks and you will earn your place among the Amazons, even as a persona servant or pet. Do you understand?"

"Yes, your majesty," Timmy answered.

"Good." Hippolyta retrieved a birdcage, clean and stainless, and stuffed it with a two sacks of fluff, one resembling a pillow and another resembling a mattress, and a tiny scrap of a weighted cloth. "Now, my young charge, this is where you will be sleeping from now on. You may rest here and allow your weariness to pass until tonight's feast. I will personally introduce you to the Amazon high council and address your bondage to me."

Timmy groaned, not just tiredly but also worriedly. "What if they don't like me?"

"They will have mixed feelings about your arrival, for certain," Hippolyta answered, "but they will come to love you in their own time. I cannot force the Amazons to love my children simply because they are the children of their Queen. It is up to them to decide whether they will accept you as one of our own or not.. and I do hope, dear child, they do not reject you simply for being the son of Man's World."

"Why?"

"That, my young charge, is a story for a different time." Hippolyta opened the cage door, tilted her palm so Timmy would step off into the interior, and reached inside to gently tuck him in for his afternoon slumber. "Now get some rest, young one. If there is anything you need, I won't be far away."

"Okay." Timmy finished it with a cute yawn as he allowed the giantess to tuck him into his new bed. It wasn't like his bed back home, but it was certainly more comfortable. Hippolyta closed the door and watched as her new adopted son slept, smiling at how peaceful he looked despite the nightmares he had lived through. She laid down on her bed and looked out the window to the sea, cursing the wards surrounding the offshores of Themiscyra for putting the young child through so much pain. Her eyes fluttered to sleep, allowing Morpheus to take her into the world of dreams.

What happens next?

1.) Timmy and Hippolyta wake up for dinner with the Amazon high council.
2.) Someone sneaks into the chambers and kidnaps Timmy while he and Hippolyta sleep!
15512121.title: An Afternoon Nap with the Queen

choices: The Amazons March On Without Him
1551214.content:
On Themyscira, legions of Amazon soldiers would be sent to patrol the shores for any intruder or potential threat that dared invade their paradise. This particular legion, led by the Amazon's general, Phillipus, and their strongest warrior, Artemis of Bana-Mighdall, was ordered by Queen Hippolyta herself to patrol the shores in lieu of a recent event happening just a mile away from their shores within the mystic barriers. Their main priority was to search the perimeter of the island for any survivors who could possibly have bypassed the guarding megalodons and made it to shore.

As per Aphrodite's Law, men were not allowed to set foot on the village, and this extended to male children as well, except for certain men who were permitted to enter the island by the Queen herself. Nonetheless, since Aphrodite's Law also governs the Amazons' lives through love, then they must accommodate them in their own fashion. The men would be taken to recover in the dungeons, while the women would recover in an Amazon's home. This was how it was on Paradise Island, and it was the soldiers' job to enforce this law unless the Queen has granted an exception under certain conditions.

While Timmy had wept, he picked up the hearing of someone striding the sands, accompanied by the slight tremors with each stride. Timmy broke away from his mourning and turned to the direction of the sound. The people were a group of armored giant women, all of them dressed in leather breastplates and metal bracelets on their wrists reaching just below her forearms. Around their waists, they all wore a belt with a scabbard sheathed with a sword, holding up a short beige skirt, and knee-high leather gladiator sandals worn on their feet. They were also armed, holding a large spear in one hand, a shield in the other, and a vigilant look on their faces.

Timmy almost whimpered as the lead soldier, a giant black woman, marched towards his location. Her sandaled foot raised in the air to take another step, completely unaware that the tiny little boy was underneath its leather sole. The boy whimpered, curled up into a tight little ball, and cried right as the dark-skinned giantess planted her foot on top of its spot. Timmy tensed up, like he was expecting that moment when he would be squashed under the giant's foot like a little bug, but opened his eyes to face a set of five giant chocolate-colored toes inches away from his face. His eyes turned upwards towards the colossal figure of the woman who nearly squished him, looking and pointing out at the sea.

"There, as the Queen said it would be," the ebony giantess leading the giant troop of female soldiers said, literally and figuratively pointing at the black smoke in the distant horizon. "The aircraft has crashed a mile away from the shores, meaning there is a chance that a survivor may have swam to these shores along this side."

"This is a waste of our time,” addressed the redheaded giantess, Artemis of the Bana-Mighdall. “I have seen footages of airplanes in different parts of Man's World crashing before, and no one survives a crash like this. Even if someone did, there is no way they would make it to these shores without invoking the megalodon's hungry wrath."

The leading armored black woman and turned to the impatient Amazon. “Be still your tongue and your impatience, Artemis,” General Phillipus ordered firmly. “Our orders are to bring in any survivor who has made it to these shores. Remember, there are men in this world who have survived greater disasters, including those who have crashed into our waters in similar crafts. Who is to say that anyone could have survived that disaster and has gone unnoticed by our megalodons?"

Artemis scoffed. "If it is so, then why do we not see any bodies in the water, or tracks leading from the waters and onto the shores?"

"There is no clear explanation for that yet, Artemis," Phillipus affirmed, turning towards her sister-in-arms. Unbeknownst to her, however, the simple act of shuffling her feet to face the redheaded warrior nearly caused her to step on Timmy at her feet down below. "However, our bickering is only ensuring a step away from discovering any survivors, which goes against the Queen's orders. So unless you have anything else to add, I suggest we continue along the shoreline and search the areas between here and the city."

While the legion of armored giantesses argued amongst themselves, Timmy watched and listened to it all down at their toes. He didn’t understand what the giantesses would do to him if they ever found him, but it frightened him as much as the Brobdingnagian size difference between them did. His close call with the black giantess's foot nearly ground him into a little bloody smear in the sand. If that was only because they weren't aware of his presence at their feet, then he dreaded to think of what would happen to him if they were aware. They could easily stamp on him, press him underneath their rear ends, or even swallow him whole! Timmy shuddered at the thought, but he shook it away and quickly thought of what to do next.

1.) Timmy runs and hides from the giant Amazon soldiers in fear for their potentially harmful treatment.
2.) Timmy screams, jumps, and waves at the giantesses to grab their attention. Maybe they could help him!
3.) Timmy grabs one of the giantess's sandals by the straps and hitches a dangerous ride at their feet.
4.) Before Timmy could do anything, one of the Amazons spots him at their feet.
5.) Before Timmy could do anything, the Amazons march away, leaving Timmy alone.
1551214.title: A Group of Amazon Soldiers

1552.content:
Marvel Comics is one of the biggest comic book companies in the world, notable for its more prominent locations such as Manhattan, its heroes such as Spider-Man, Iron Man, Captain America, Thor, and villains such as Doctor Doom, Red Skull, Thanos, and the Green Goblin.

In this route, we will be focusing on certain boy characters appearing in the DC Universe, either as a canon character such as young Peter Parker (a.k.a. Spider-Man), or an original character of your choice within the canon DC Universe. They will be shrunken, born tiny, or every woman in the DC Comics is bigger than the normal-sized character. The only question is, is the focus character from the DC Comics or an original character?
1552.title: Marvel Comics

15521.content:
The focus boy character is a character canon to the DC Universe.

Choose one of the following characters you want to focus on...

Peter Parker/Spider-Man: The orphaned son of the late Richard and Mary Parker and raised by his Uncle Ben and Aunt May. A shy school nerd often picked on by his peers, Peter was bitten by a spider infused with experimental radiation and granted him heightened agility, the ability to crawl onto surfaces, and to sense incoming danger. After his Uncle Ben was killed by a burglar he let go, Peter Parker realized his responsibility as a hero. "With great power comes great responsibility."

Miles Morales/Spider-Man: The son of Jefferson Davis and Rio Morales, and the second person to take up the heroic mantle of Spider-Man in the Ultimates universe. After the universe's Peter Parker died following his final battle with the Green Goblin and his villainous horde, Miles Morales was bitten by the same spider which infused Peter with similar spider powers, with the additional ability to camouflage and produce stun blasts. Miles works hard to carry on Peter Parker's legacy.

Benjamin "Benjy" Parker II: The biological son of Peter Parker/Spider-Jane and Mary Jane "MJ" Watson-Parker, and the younger brother of May "Mayday" Parker/Spider-Girl. Born in a universe where Peter Parker retires his Spider-Man mantle following a horrific battle with the Green Goblin, Benjy was born with with some of his father’s abilities, which includes superhuman strength and shooting off webbing. Because of his familial ties with Spider-Man and Spider-Girl, Benjy is often the target of enemy attacks.

-or-

Franklin Richards/Powerhouse: The biological son of Franklin Richards/Mr. Fantastic and Sue Storm/Invisible Woman, two central members of the Fantastic Four. Born mutated due to the astronomical radiation which gave Reed and Sue their powers, Franklin was gifted with psionic abilities and is one of the most powerful mutants in the world. He has the mutant ability to reshape reality, which, plus his familial ties with the Fantastic Four, makes him a target of enemy attacks.
15521.title: Canon

choices: Son of the World's Tiniest Mutant
15522.content:
The focus main boy character is an original character and non-canon to the main DC Comics storyline.

Choose one of these story routes you want to focus on...

An Inhuman Size-Changer: The boy is born normal-sized, but he is related to a female family member/friend's exposure to the Inhumans' Terrigen Bomb which activated her latent genetic ability to manipulate the size of anyone or anything she touches, including the boy with whom she flaunts her powers around him. In addition, the shrunken targets are also granted physical endurance and invincibility. The female size manipulator is either a hero, a villain, or an anti-hero; either way, she likes to have the boy tag along with her in her misadventures.

Son of the World's Tiniest Mutant: The boy is the son of the shrunken mutant, Shortpack, and the shape-shifting mutant, Raven Darkholme/Mystique, nine months after a brief one-night stand during their downtime from their field operation. Shortpack's mutant genes were passed down to his son, instantly shrinking him to the size of a #2 pencil eraser, small enough that only Jean Grey noticed his presence in Mystique's womb. After he was born, he was placed into the care Mystique's lover, Irene Adler/Destiny. The boy is often visited by his mother and her female X-Men friends until he was old enough to join attend Xavier's School for Gifted Youngsters.

Sizing the Fourth Wall: The boy is a real world Marvel Comics teen fanatic who’s into most of the female characters but doesn’t like certain female characters such as the plus-sized heroine Big Bertha, or the fourth wall-breaking heroine, Gwenpool. Due to her ability to break the fourth wall, Gwenpool heard about the boy dissing her, so she grabs the boy and literally throws him into a comic panel where he appears tinier than the female characters he ogles. Either that or he is normal-sized and Gwen manipulates the comic’s perspectives so that the female characters appear as literal giants.

-or-

The Problem with Pym Particles: In this route, well introduce a few story routes involving Pym Particles, the experimental subatomic particles which could alter the size and mass of objects or other living beings. In one route, a bullying brother is give his comeuppance by his little sister who enlists the help of the Wasp. In the second route, a young street thief steals a container full of Pym Particles but is permanently shrunk. In the third route, one of Marvel’s terrorist organizations uses the Pym Particles to not only drastically alter the size of the female populace to become bigger than the male populace, but also their personalities so they have a sense of dominance over the male characters.
15522.title: Non-Canon

155224.content:
Each of these scenarios involves a boy affected by Pym Particles.

Which of these scenarios will apply to the shrunken boy?

The Pym Particle Problem Child: The boy is a bully who mostly picks on her little sister, who admires the shrinking heroines, Janet van Dyne and Nadia Pym, both of whom took up the mantle of the Wasp. One day, the brother takes the bullying too far, and in desperation, the sister sends a written letter addressed to Janet, asking her and Nadia to deal with her problem. After an arrangement with the bullying brother's female family members, the boy is shrunken down by a malfunctioning Pym Disk and is taught a lesson in humility, either through the Wasp, their friends, or his female family members.

The Pym Particle Plunderer: The boy steals a container of Pym Particles with the promise of payment by Monica Rappaccini, the current lead scientist of the Advanced Idea Mechanics (or A.I.M. for short) for her latest plan. During his heist, the boy is accidentally exposed to the Pym Particles, causing him to permanently shrink to the size of an ant. He is either caught and at the mercy of the giant female members of the Avengers (such as Wasp, She-Hulk, and Tigra), or he escapes but is sought by the giant villainesses.

-or-

The Pym Particle Plague: Monica Rappaccini successfully acquires the Pym Particles from the boy in the second route and genetically modifies it with the Mandrill’s mind-controlling pheromones so that it will affect the entire female population of Earth, including the heroes and villains. The male populace will shrink or the female heroes and villains will grow into giants. Either way, the females affected will establish a sense of dominance over the male populace. Follow a boy as he tries to survive the outbreak of the modified Pym Particles plague on the world.
155224.title: The Problems with Pym Particles

info.brief_description: Play as a young boy who interacts with a giant woman, or the other way around!
info.description:
Re-written with permission by cosmicdonut a.k.a. ButterBazooka, the original author.

You are a young boy, who is either shrunken by various circumstances, born tiny, or born normal-sized, all cases surrounded by giantesses of every kind. As either an original character from all different reaches of visual media, you either explore the route as a small boy as he goes through his life with giantesses involved in his life, or you explore the route as the giantess who interacts with said small boys. The giantesses can be either playful, maternal, oblivious, or cruel.

You are free to add anything to the storyline, so long as you follow these guidelines.

GUIDELINES:

1.) At the beginning of the story routes, when you're introducing an original character to your story route, make sure you add in this short bio.

Name:
Age:
Eyes:
Hair:
Height:
Weight:
Ethnicity:
Backstory:

FOR EXAMPLE:

Name: Tommy Winslow
Age: 10 years old
Eyes: Green
Hair: Brown
Height: 3' 9"
Weight: 116 lbs.
Ethnicity: White/Caucasian
Backstory: Tommy Winslow is the only son of Kelly Winslow, the younger brother of Lindsey and Brianna, and the older brother of Wendy. As a child, Tommy was doted on by his loving sister, Brianna, and initially volunteered to be the guinea pig for her experiments. As Tommy grew older, however, he realized that the side effects of Brianna's experiments have often humiliated him, thus making him cautious and distant from her. His cautious behavior has also turned hostile towards his brilliant sister.

Name: Angela "Mama Angie" Bennett
Age: 40 years old
Eyes: Black
Hair: Black
Height: 5' 10"
Weight: 182 lbs.
Ethnicity: White/Caucasian
Backstory: Angela Bennett is a lead stripper in the XXX Bombshells strip club in the red light district. A veteran stripper and dancer, she earned the moniker "Mama" after teaching and nurturing the younger dancers. Her thick assets, her D-cup breasts, and her luscious lips arouse her customers' fantasies. After her shifted ended at midnight, Angela would discover a certain baby boy, abandoned on the sidewalk, born the size of her thumb. She'd soon find another meaning to her stripper name "Mama Angie."

2.) The following is a list of simple rules that must be followed.
No giant males
No tiny females (but normal-sized women interacting with giantesses is encouraged)
No gore
No digestion (but possible reformation is encouraged)
No scat or piss content (but full tour is encouraged)
No sex
No unbirth
No futanari/hermaphrodites
No killing the main characters
The maximum age for the boy characters must be 15 years or younger (if this is the case, make sure the lead character's age somehow regresses below 15 years).
The minimum age for the girl characters must be 3 years or older (on that note, keep the interactions with young girl/loli characters 9 years or younger at a minimum)

3.) Be sure to write in complete sentences, write with good grammar, and write each chapter in a minimum of three sentences. The only exception to this rule is if you are adding a chapter with multiple options.

4.) Do not end the story unless you're intending to looping the storyline into a different, preexisting chapter canon to the story route (This guideline was inspired by the looping storylines by Kooplan's Fire Emblem SW where the chapters labeled with (END) links to another preexisting chapter.)

5.) Above all else, have fun!!!
